summary: Fixed login API endpoint error. The user had changed the fetch URL to /api/admin-login but the actual API route is /api/admin/login. Fixed the endpoint and added better error handling to check for JSON responses before parsing. Login should now work correctly.
current_status: Fixed API endpoint mismatch. Login page now correctly calls /api/admin/login. Added JSON content-type validation to prevent parsing errors. Login functionality should work properly now.
